enum: Sub-indicator A: Existence of an SPP policy/action plan and/or SPP regulatory requirements
Sub-indicator B: The public procurement regulatory framework is conducive to SPP
Sub-indicator C: Practical support delivered to procurement practitioners in the implementation of SPP
Sub-indicator D: SPP purchasing criteria / buying standards / requirements
Sub-indicator E: Existence of an SPP monitoring system

title: Degré de mise en œuvre des politiques et plans d’action relatifs aux pratiques durables de passation des marchés publics
